Configure the Sort Options Available for the Product List Page

Give buyers flexibility for discovering all products that belong to a specific category or that match their search query. Specify which options and criteria are available on the Product List page for sorting the results, and enforce a default sort behavior.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To access CC Admin and change settings:	Access B2B Commerce for Visualforce Admin Settings permission set

For category results, you can specify the following sort options:

For search results, you can specify the following sort options:

Sequence (1)
Sort products by the value of the Sequence field on each product's CC Product Category related record, which assigns the product to a specific category. With this option, you can manually control the order of products that buyers see.

For example, let’s say that you have two products assigned to the same category. One product's CC Product Category related record has a sequence of 100, and the other has a sequence of 200. By default, the Product List page sorts by sequence in ascending order, so lower sequence values display first. The product whose CC Product Category has the sequence 100 displays first, and the product whose CC Product Category has the sequence 200 displays second. Optionally, you can sort by sequence in descending order, so that higher sequence values display first.

NOTE Sequence sorting is available only for category results. In the Capricorn Coffee demo storefront, Sequence is the default sort option for category results. You can also specify whether Name, Newest, or Price is the default sort option for category results.
Relevance (2)
Sort products by the significance of matching the criteria you've specified in the Catalog Search Ranking storefront settings.
NOTE Relevance sorting is available only for search results on the Product List page, and is always the default sort method for search results.
Name (3)
Sort products by the value of the Product Name field on each product record. Buyers can choose to sort in alphabetical or reverse alphabetical order.
Newest (4)
Sort products by the value of the Start Date field on each product record. The most recent Start Date values sort to the top of the list.
Price (5)
Sort products from low price to high price (ascending order) or high price to low price (descending order).
NOTE The buyer's experience when sorting by price can be inconsistent, depending on the buyer's entitlements, the selected page size, and your specified buffer size.

To configure the sort options available on the Product List page, update your storefront configuration settings.

On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select Product List (3).
Specify the available sort options.
Find the following sort configurations (4), and check their values (5):
Show Sort: Sequence
Show Sort: Relevance
Show Sort: Name
Show Sort: Newest
Show Sort: Price
If a sort option you want to include is TRUE, skip this step.
If a sort option you want to include is FALSE or doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	
Show Sort: Sequence
Show Sort: Relevance
Show Sort: Name
Show Sort: Newest
Show Sort: Price

Page	PLP
Value	TRUE
If you're keeping the Sequence sort option, specify whether to sort by sequence value in ascending or descending order.
Find the Sort Ascending configuration (6), and find its value (7).
If Sort Ascending is TRUE, Sequence sorts from lowest to highest sequence value.
If Sort Ascending is FALSE, Sequence sorts from highest to lowest sequence value.
If Sort Ascending doesn't exist, or you want to change the current value, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	Sort Ascending
Page	PLP
Value	TRUE or FALSE
Specify the default sort option for category results.
Find the Default Sort configuration (8), and find its value (9):
sequence
name
newest
price

If Sort Ascending doesn't exist, or you want to change the current value, continue to the next step.

Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	Default Sort
Page	PLP
Value	
sequence
name
newest
price
